snippet.title: SMILE FOR ME Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
smileformegame.com

STEAM: store.steampowered.com/app/1018850/Smile_For_Me/
ITCH.IO: gabelane.itch.io/smileforme

Smile For Me is an unconventional Point-and-Click Adventure Game that puts you at the center of an abstract world! Nod and shake your head to chat with new friends, and solve their mysteries to cheer them up. The People are bizarre, the Puzzles are Wack, and the World hides a sinister secret...

contact:  smileformegame.com/contact
presskit:   LimboLane.com/SmileForMe.html
